org.pepstock.charba.client.labels

Class LabelsOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.labels.LabelsOptionsBuilder

  • public final class LabelsOptionsBuilder
extends Object
    Comfortable object to create LabelsPlugin.ID plugin options by a builder.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
